LSMLIB Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
_Grid
_LSM_DataArrays
LSMLIB::BoundaryConditionModule< DIM >The BoundaryConditionModule provides support for several common boundary conditions for level set functions: homogeneous Neumann, extrapolation, and anti-periodic boundary conditions. See the NOTES section for how to set periodic boundary conditions
LSMLIB::FieldExtensionAlgorithm< DIM >The FieldExtensionAlgorithm class is a utility class that provides support for extending field values off of the interface defined by the zero level set
HeapNode
LSMLIB::LevelSetFunctionIntegrator< DIM >The LevelSetFunctionIntegrator class provides the core functionality required to integrate level set equation for evolving the level set function that capture the dynamics of implicit surfaces and curves. Support is provided for level set method calculations in one-, two- and three-dimensions
LSMLIB::LevelSetFunctionIntegratorStrategy< DIM >The LevelSetFunctionIntegratorStrategy class defines the interface for the time integration of the level set functions in the level set method
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodAlgorithm< DIM >The LevelSetMethodAlgorithm class provides a simple interface for using the LevelSetMethod classes to capture the dynamics of implicit surfaces and curves in one-, two- and three-dimensions. It also provides support for vector level set method calculations
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodGriddingAlgorithm< DIM >The LevelSetMethodGriddingAlgorithm class provides basic functionality for managing grid refinement and data initialization for the the level set functions and variables involved in the computation of the velocity field
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodGriddingStrategy< DIM >The LevelSetMethodGriddingStrategy class defines the interface for data initialization and management of grid refinement for the level set method computation
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodPatchStrategy< DIM >The LevelSetMethodPatchStrategy class defines the interface for single patch, problem specific numerical routines
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodToolbox< DIM >LevelSetMethodToolbox is a utility class that provides support for several basic level set method algorithms and computations
LSMLIB::LevelSetMethodVelocityFieldStrategy< DIM >The LevelSetMethodVelocityFieldStrategy class defines the interface for supplying the external velocity field and/or normal velocity field for a level set method calculation
LSMLIB::OrthogonalizationAlgorithm< DIM >OrthogonalizationAlgorithm is a utility class that provides support for orthogonalizing two level set functions, phi and psi
LSMLIB::ReinitializationAlgorithm< DIM >ReinitializationAlgorithm is a utility class that provides support for reinitializing the a level set function to be a distance function
